snippet: The authorities said a wounded security guard shot back and killed a passenger who opened fire when he was kicked off a public bus a little before 2 a.m. on Monday.
abstract: Las Vegas authorities say wounded security guard returned fire and killed passenger who opened fire when he was kicked off a public bus.
lead_paragraph: The authorities said a wounded security guard shot back and killed a passenger who opened fire when he was kicked off a public bus a little before 2 a.m. on Monday.

headline.main: Nevada: Guard Who Was Shot Kills Gunman on Bus
headline.print_headline: Nevada: Guard Who Was Shot Kills Gunman on Bus
